title: Real World Acumen
text:
Github
  

  
  
This is the note repository for learning more about business from top companies in different industries.
This is by no means a complete guide. Rather, it is my personal note-taking system. If it helps you in your data science journey, Iâ€™d be more than happy.
Please create an issue in the GitHub repository if you have any feedback.

title: Overview
text:
Relevant skills

Statistical Modeling: Core for A/B testing, churn modeling, and forecasting.
Causal Inference: Crucial for understanding the impact of business strategies.
Survey Analysis: Applicable to customer feedback and market research.
Time Series Forecasting: Directly valuable for demand forecasting and financial modeling.

title: Overview
text:
Resources
Kaggle: Data Science Case Studies

title: Search Engine
text: Value Proposition: Free access to information, services, and platforms. Revenue Streams: Ads (Google Ads, YouTube Ads), Cloud services. Key Metrics: Search Queries, Ad Impressions, Cost-per-Click (CPC). Data Strategy: Natural Language Processing (NLP) for search results, predictive models for ad targeting. Your Advantage: Skills from macroeconomic modeling can be applied to forecasting trends and analyzing large-scale user behavior patterns.

title: E-commerce
text: Value Proposition: One-stop shopping experience with fast delivery and AWS for cloud computing. Revenue Streams: E-commerce sales, AWS, and Prime subscriptions. Key Metrics: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV), Inventory Turnover, AWS Usage Metrics. Data Strategy: Recommender systems, dynamic pricing models, and supply chain optimization. Your Advantage: Background in time series forecasting (e.g., from macroeconomic trends) applies directly to demand prediction and inventory management.

title: Social Media
text:
Value Proposition: Connects people and businesses through social platforms. Revenue Streams: 98% from targeted ads.
Key Metrics: Daily Active Users (DAU), Ad Click-Through Rates (CTR), Average Revenue per User (ARPU).
Data Strategy: Uses machine learning for ad personalization, recommendation systems, and sentiment analysis.
Your Advantage: Experience in health and macroeconomics can transfer to analyzing user behavior trends, segmentation models, and A/B testing.

title: E-commerce
text: Value Proposition: Personalized streaming content. Revenue Streams: Subscription fees. Key Metrics: Retention Rate, Hours Streamed per User. Data Strategy: Recommender systems, churn modeling, and A/B testing for content optimization. Your Advantage: Experience in statistical modeling for behavior patterns and survey analysis from health statistics.
